00047 template <typename IndexType, typename ValueType, typename MemorySpace>
00048 struct amg_container
00049 {
00050 };
00051 
00052 template <typename IndexType, typename ValueType>
00053 struct amg_container<IndexType,ValueType,cusp::host_memory>
00054 {
00055     // use CSR on host
00056     typedef typename cusp::csr_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,cusp::host_memory> setup_type;
00057     typedef typename cusp::csr_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,cusp::host_memory> solve_type;
00058 };
00059 
00060 template <typename IndexType, typename ValueType>
00061 struct amg_container<IndexType,ValueType,cusp::device_memory>
00062 {
00063     // use COO on device
00064     typedef typename cusp::coo_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,cusp::device_memory> setup_type;
00065     typedef typename cusp::hyb_matrix<IndexType,ValueType,cusp::device_memory> solve_type;
00066 };
00067 
00073 template <typename IndexType, typename ValueType, typename MemorySpace>
00074 class smoothed_aggregation : public cusp::linear_operator<ValueType, MemorySpace, IndexType>
00075 {
00076 
00077     typedef typename amg_container<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>::setup_type SetupMatrixType;
00078     typedef typename amg_container<IndexType,ValueType,MemorySpace>::solve_type SolveMatrixType;
00079 
00080     struct level
00081     {
00082         SetupMatrixType A_; // matrix
00083         SolveMatrixType R;  // restriction operator
00084         SolveMatrixType A;  // matrix
00085         SolveMatrixType P;  // prolongation operator
00086         cusp::array1d<IndexType,MemorySpace> aggregates;      // aggregates
00087         cusp::array1d<ValueType,MemorySpace> B;               // near-nullspace candidates
00088         cusp::array1d<ValueType,MemorySpace> x;               // per-level solution
00089         cusp::array1d<ValueType,MemorySpace> b;               // per-level rhs
00090         cusp::array1d<ValueType,MemorySpace> residual;        // per-level residual
00091         
00092         #ifndef USE_POLY_SMOOTHER
00093         cusp::relaxation::jacobi<ValueType,MemorySpace> smoother;
00094         #else
00095         cusp::relaxation::polynomial<ValueType,MemorySpace> smoother;
00096         #endif
00097     };
00098 
00099     std::vector<level> levels;
00100         
00101     cusp::detail::lu_solver<ValueType, cusp::host_memory> LU;
00102 
00103     ValueType theta;
00104 
00105     public:
00106 
00107     template <typename MatrixType>
00108     smoothed_aggregation(const MatrixType& A, const ValueType theta=0);
00109 
00110     
00111     template <typename Array1, typename Array2>
00112     void operator()(const Array1& x, Array2& y);
00113 
00114     template <typename Array1, typename Array2>
00115     void solve(const Array1& b, Array2& x);
00116 
00117     template <typename Array1, typename Array2, typename Monitor>
00118     void solve(const Array1& b, Array2& x, Monitor& monitor);
00119 
00120     void print( void );
00121 
00122     double operator_complexity( void );
00123 
00124     double grid_complexity( void );
00125 
00126     protected:
00127 
00128     void extend_hierarchy(void);
00129 
00130     template <typename Array1, typename Array2>
00131     void _solve(const Array1& b, Array2& x, const size_t i);
00132 };
00136 } // end namespace precond
